title: How to write an action movie one-liner? What is the basis for writing one - Quora

response.answer_text: An action movie one-liner? Maybe you could get some inspiration from watching old action movies, especially ones starring Kurt Russel or Sylvester Stallone? There are also some really cool YouTube clips with an ensemble of one-liners: “Top 10 Hilarious Action Hero One-Liners.” “Top Ten Sylvester Stallone Quotes - Movie Countdown HD.” These are good ones, but there are tons more.
